title: Nature Loops 2
description: The second installment of the Epic Nature Loops sound effects series is here! Welcome to a freshly field recorded and curated ambient sound pack collection.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Video Demo


Nature Loops 2 features many essential habitats of real life & sound types needed for video games, & movies. The sound files are game ready & seamlessly loop-able. You & your users can experience new & exciting natural locations captured across the rolling hills of Tennessee, Cades Cove, the Smoky Mountains, Breckenridge Mountains, Natchez Trace, North Carolina, New York & the countryside of Italy. 


Peaceful natural sound recordings, unique areas discovered & recorded, all sounds of Nature Loops 2 were edited to bring your project to life. After 6 month of field recording trips, we are happy to bring you this set of 103 time saving & versatile natural ambient background sounds meticulously created for sound designers & game developers like you! 


What’s Included?

This pack has plenty of options to help your game background & ambience sound come to life. The Epic Nature Loops 2 ambience sound effects library is organized into popular sound genre folders that make it easier to create outstanding & realistic nature ambience experiences in the following folder structure: Birds, Countryside, Creek, Forest, Mountain, Lake, Night, Ocean, Rain, Thunder, River, Stream, Water Swells, Waterfalls & Wind.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata

All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures. Has extensive metadata embed in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time.


All of the 103 nature loop sound fx files are designed to make your life easier, production workflow faster and delivered in 96kHz/24bit .WAV file format to maintain top-notch audio fidelity.


Product details: 

  • 103 nature loops
  • Ambience Sound Library
  • 2 hours 24 minutes of ambience sound
  • All in 96k 24bit .wav
  • 5.02GB of audio samples
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • UCS Compliant
  • 10 bird sound loops - hawk, chickadee, scarlet, warbler, robbins, overbird
  • 3 farm & countryside loops
  • 9 creek loops
  • 10 forest loops
  • 6 mountain & lake loops
  • 15 grassland & night loops
  • 8 ocean waves loops
  • 10 rain & thunderstorm loops
  • 3 river flow loops
  • 7 water stream loops
  • 5 water swelling loops
  • 10 waterfall loops
  • 7 general wind ambience loops
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty-free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
technicalDetails:
